CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The weight - average molecular weight ( M w ) , number - average molecular weight ( M n ) , and polydispersity index ( PDI ) of P1- P7 were measured by SEC with o-dichlorobenzene as an eluent at 80 ° C. The characteristics of the polymers are summarized in Table 1.

Let's think step by step.

1. P1 to P7: These are the names of the polymers.
2. M w (weight-average molecular weight)
3. M n (number-average molecular weight)
4. o-dichlorobenzene: This is the name of the eluent used in Size Exclusion Chromatography (SEC).

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are P1 to P7 and o-dichlorobenzene.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

The Material Name entities in the paragraph are:
1. P1 to P7.

These are the names of the polymers being referred to in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P1 |
| P2 |
| P3 |
| P4 |
| P5 |
| P6 |
| P7 |
| o-dichlorobenzene |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The weight - average molecular weight ( M w ) , number - average molecular weight ( M n ) , and polydispersity index ( PDI ) of P1- P7 were measured by SEC with o-dichlorobenzene as an eluent at 80 ° C. The characteristics of the polymers are summarized in Table 1.

Let's think step by step.

1. weight-average molecular weight (Mw)
2. number-average molecular weight (Mn)
3. polydispersity index (PDI)
4. eluent (in this context, it can be considered as the property "solvent" or "medium" used in SEC)
5. temperature (80 °C)

These are the property names mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. weight-average molecular weight (Mw)
2. number-average molecular weight (Mn)
3. polydispersity index (PDI)

These are the material properties mentioned in the paragraph. The other entities, such as temperature and eluent, are not material properties but rather experimental conditions or methods used to measure the material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| weight-average molecular weight (Mw) |
| number-average molecular weight (Mn) |
| polydispersity index (PDI) |
